name: get_4d_results
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool get_4d_results.
Tool description: Live 4D results for Malaysia and Singapore.
API description: Get 4D results by date and company.
Results including 4D and jackpot.

version.description: The version of the 4D results API to use.

date.description: The date for which the 4D results are to be fetched, in YYYY-MM-DD format.

company.description: Magnum (MAGNUM), Sports Toto (TOTO), Damacai (DAMACAI), Cashsweep (CASHSWEEP), Sabah 88 (SABAH88), Sadakan (STC), Singapore (SG)
